33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Hudhaifah bin Al-Yaman narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"By the One in Whose Hand is my soul! Either you command good and forbid evil, or Allah will soon send upon you a punishment from Him, then you will call upon Him, but He will not respond to you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَمْرِ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَالنَّهْىِ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Commanding Good and Forbidding Evil
